name: EdgeRadio
0:
”Alexa, open edge radio”
”Alexa, start edge radio”
”Alexa, ask edge radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: edge radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Edge Radio, Scotland's Hit Music Station. 

Listen live to Edge Radio on your Alexa device

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Edge Radio" or "Alexa, play Edge Radio" to start the radio.

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
